ygData.subject: RE: Guise of the Deceiver
ygData.msgSnippet: Do you know if the new item also gives the charisma bonus and DE illusion that the Guise gave.  I have been wanting a Guise for a long time now but have not
ygData.messageBody:
Do you know if the new item also gives the charisma bonus and DE illusion that
the Guise gave. I have been wanting a Guise for a long time now but have not
been high enough level to get one for myself. Sure hope the only change is that
the new item must be equipped to be used. Would also be nice if it isn't NO
DROP. Don't think we will be that lucky though.

Galtin of E'ci


> > They actually fixed the no equip = no usage problem? That might be the
> > single biggest Enhancement Verant has made to date. Is it still No Drop I
> > wonder?
>
> Well, they didn't fix it. They made a new item. The old
> guises still work without being equipped, much to the chagrin
> of the non-bard/rogue non-powerlevelers.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@... with
> the subject submissions.
